# Jeff Mehl

**Type:** Client  
**Status:** Active  
**Relationship:** Daybreak Virtual Staffing - AI Development Client  
**Revenue:** $1000/month  

## Project Details

**Primary Project:** [[Daybreak AI]] - AI chat simulation for customer service  
**Goal:** Improve AI quality for customer service interactions  
**Timeline:** Ongoing development with rollout commitment  

## Recent Progress

### **MAJOR BREAKTHROUGH - PBX Recordings Access (September 2025)**

- Uploaded PBX recordings to pCloud for AI training
- Link: https://u.pcloud.link/publink/show?code=kZNLV15ZRCRz8WrGgHf2zdaoJqxXhBaAzicy

- Asked about project rollout status

**Your Response (Sep 9, 2025):**
- Confirmed access to pCloud folder
- Thanked for medical recording editing
- **COMMITTED TO ROLLOUT THIS WEEK**

**Jeff's Follow-up (Sep 9, 2025):**
- Has LOTS more recordings available
- Can provide recordings for specific clients/industries
- Looking forward to rollout

**Your Major Update (Sep 11, 2025):**
- **BUILT TRANSCRIBER PAGE** in Admin site
- Features: Upload audio files, transcribe to text, identify speakers
- **GAME-CHANGING INSIGHTS:**
  - Quality scoring & training system
  - Real vs. simulated training data
  - Real-time call processing potential
  - Auto-summaries from call transcripts

**Key Questions for Jeff:**
- More recordings access - ongoing batches or direct access?
- Audio availability timing - how soon after calls?
